column4: i have a question is it possible to make this run thou a switch ?
Make what run through a switch
IS that a lappy with pcmcia, sata raid drives ?
there are some grub boot options to try if that does not work.  I can only assume you had the cd do a self test for errors and did not see any..
Some of the Grub Boot Options (F6) ide=nodma vga=normal nomce acpi=off pnpbios=off xdrvr=vesa xres=800x600 apm=off quiet
just loads slow... but runs fine... what type of hard drives.. ide sata both...?
do you know what speed they are?  33 66 100 133?
Loading time is not a Ub issue but a Hardware issue
when u get asec can u help me plz
Please define the problem for me while he does that
You dont need those scripts to install things
Since you have not told people what kind of laptop and drivers for which device.. I have no idea
You probably just need to recompile alsa... fyi  use version 15 not 16...
Not if you want it to work.. 16 has an issue with our mixer...
